game.name: Frozen And Ariel Rivals In Love
game.description:
Lovely mermaid Ariel and frozen Elsa are already Bffs. However, they both see a handsome man named Eric and fell in love with him at the same time. Now they have become the biggest rivals and decided to start a competition. The girl with a sexy and beautiful look will be able to win the heart of this handsome man. Do you guide both of them to be dressed up perfectly before Eric comes? Join Frozen And Ariel Rivals In Love and be prepared to help them get ready before her date with this handsome man!
You would find a huge collection of trendy and fashionable dresses in their wardrobe. Dress them up one by one and help Eric decide who will be the winner of his heart in this brand new dressing game for girls! Firstly, give Elsa the needful make-up and then give her a nice hairstyle. Get your girl ready in pink and black color frock with some design patterns on it or choose a cool top and combine it with a suitable bottom! Do not forget to adorn the lady with the sparkling jewelry, a matching handbag and a pair of sandals!
Hurry up ladies! Ariel is also waiting for her turn. Give her a fabulous hairstyle and help her to use the common beauty items! She will look fabulous in a combination of black top and orange with some black dots bottom or give her a blue frock with white color ribbon on its border. Suit her outfit with a pair of awesome jewelry, a pair of black or blue sandals and the matching handbag in this html5 princess dress up game! Check out more free doll dress-up games on atmegame.com and enjoy online, no download required!
